title: (x) Atomic Ramble logo - Mountain Dew (customised Serpentine) {Ignacio (Nick Cooke)}
content:
It reminds me of Serpentine, somewhat. Has anyone seen this before?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080314123358im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/atomic_3628.jpg)

 [‹ (x) Serif face in Steelpoint Harbor logo - Berling {Raph}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080314123358/http:/www.typophile.com/node/31490 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Celtel logo rounded sans - Helvetica Rounded {Marten Fischer} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080314123358/http:/www.typophile.com/node/31512 "Go to next forum topic")
author: evan

comments.content:
I think it IS Serpentine which has been customised to make it even better – Nice!

Nick Cooke
That logo is cool like a penguin !
